snippet: The author, a native of Mumbai studying at New York University, writes that her dreams of unlimited freedom were brought to earth by the realization that "real life isn't set to music."
abstract: The author, a native of Mumbai studying at New York University, writes that her dreams of unlimited freedom were brought to earth by the realization that "real life isn't set to music."

headline.main: The 'Heady Rush' of Freedom in College, and How to Manage It
